Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Alex Koiter. Author, maintainer.
    Associate Professor, Department of Geography and Environment, Brandon University

  • Emily H Markowitz. Reviewer.
    Research Fisheries Biologist, Alaska Fisheries Science Center, NOAA Fisheries | U.S. Department of Commerce. Emily reviewed the package for rOpenSci, see https://github.com/ropensci/software-review/issues/658
